attributes.additional_details: In France E Cigs are totally accepted in all establishments in fact positively encouraged. The UK needs to come into line that using these are a positive step for health and will cut down on 'real' cigarette smoking to the benefit of the NHS and the country....Lets change the law or help the perception that e cigs are harmful to others OR stop the ridiculous thought that people think these are REAL cigarettes.....it is a positive step....not a negative step

rejection.details: Please resubmit with a clear statement of what action you want the Government to take.
